mapper.select: select serial, title, content, begin, end, begintime, tbl_schedule.regdate, tbl_emp.ename ename, tbl_schedule.empno from tbl_schedule, tbl_emp where tbl_schedule.empno = tbl_emp.empno and serial=#{serial}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_schedule (serial, title, content, begin, end, begintime, regdate, deptno, empno) values (tbl_schedule_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{begin}, #{end}, #{begintime}, sysdate, #{deptno}, #{empno})
mapper.select: select deptno from tbl_emp where #{empno} = empno;

select serial, title, content, begin, end, begintime, tbl_schedule.regdate, tbl_emp.ename ename, tbl_schedule.empno from tbl_schedule, tbl_emp where tbl_schedule.empno = tbl_emp.empno
and serial like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' and title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' and begin like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' and end like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
order by serial desc
